identity.name: GastroCore
principles: Fusion: Paper Ledger aesthetics x Real-time Speed
Contrast: Dark Ink (#00280b) on Cream Paper (#fafbed)
Space: Generous padding to prevent 'Data Claustrophobia'
Touch: Large targets for wet/busy hands

usage.label: font-sans text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-8 rounded-full font-sans font-bold tracking-wide shadow-md transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-sans font-medium transition-colors

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border shadow-sm p-6 relative overflow-hidden
cards.interactive: hover:shadow-hover hover:border-primary/20 transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer group

inputs.base: bg-background border-input text-foreground rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary focus:border-transparent h-11 px-4 font-sans

layout.dashboard_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-10 bg-background min-h-screen
layout.sidebar: hidden md:flex col-span-2 flex-col gap-4 border-r border-border pr-6

login_bg.alt: Elegant restaurant interior with warm lighting
login_bg.usage: Right side of login split screen, covered with subtle overlay

empty_state.usage: Dashboard empty states or welcome banner

setup: Update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the CSS variables derived from the palette.
Install fonts: Lato and Playfair Display via Google Fonts or Fontsource.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
layout_rules: DO NOT center the main dashboard content. Use left alignment for lists.
Use the 'Bento' grid strategy: Mix wide cards (col-span-8) with tall cards (row-span-2).
Ensure the 'Service Terminal' view is dense but touch-friendly (min-height 44px for rows).
component_overrides: Customize Shadcn Card to use the #f3f6de background.
Customize Shadcn Button to be pill-shaped (rounded-full).
Use Sonner for toasts, styled with the cream/green palette.

universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Never use pure black (#000000); use the dark green (#00280b) instead.
Animations must be 'snappy' (duration-200 ease-out) for UI interactions.
Accessibility: Ensure text on the yellow accent is ALWAYS dark green.
